mapper.select: SELECT ct.id,t.`name`,t.ticket_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time FROM coupon_activity_ticket ct LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket t ON ct.ticket_no = t.ticket_no LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket_info ti ON t.last_ticket_info_no = ti.ticket_info_no WHERE ct.activity_no = #{activityNo}

SELECT t.id,t.ticket_no,t.`name`,t.ticket_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,ct.id activity_ticket_id FROM coupon_activity_ticket ct LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket t ON ct.ticket_no = t.ticket_no LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket_info ti ON t.last_ticket_info_no = ti.ticket_info_no WHERE 1=1 AND ct.activity_no = #{q.activityNo}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')

SELECT t.id,t.ticket_no,t.`name`,t.ticket_sum - t.use_num remain_num,ti.begin_time,ti.end_time,case when ct.id is null then 'false' else 'true' end selected FROM coupon_ticket t LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket_info ti ON t.last_ticket_info_no = ti.ticket_info_no LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_ticket ct ON ct.ticket_no = t.ticket_no AND ct.activity_no = #{q.activityNo} WHERE 1=1 AND t.shop_no = #{q.shopNo}
and ti.name like concat('%',#{q.name},'%')

SELECT uti.id,uti.status,uti.create_time,ti.use_type,ti.full_money,ti.discount_money,u.`name`,u.phone FROM coupon_user_ticket_info uti LEFT JOIN coupon_ticket_info ti ON uti.ticket_info_no = ti.ticket_info_no LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = uti.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND uti.create_time > #{q.createTimeS}
AND date(uti.create_time) <= date(#{q.createTimeE})
AND uti.status = 1
AND ti.end_time < NOW()
AND ti.end_time > NOW()
AND (u.name like CONCAT('%',#{q.username},'%') or u.phone = #{q.username}) AND u.phone = #{q.phone}
